EmailTemplate.name: Safeguarding Training Link re-send
EmailTemplate.subject: Safeguarding Training Link from Supply Desk
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name}
Re: Important Safeguarding Training
Supply Desk are working in close partnership with school groups, academies and local authorities to ensure all of our candidates are trained in accordance with the DfE guidance on “Safeguarding Children and Safer Recruitment in Education”.
Although the statutory obligation is on the school to adhere to the regulations under section 175 of the Education Act 2002, we believe it is important that all candidates working through the Supply Desk have completed our own safeguarding training, refreshed every year.
Please could you kindly take 15 minutes of your time to complete our ‘Safeguarding Children Awareness’ course by following the link below:
http://www.synarbor.net/training/
Once you have confirmed your contact details, please remember the training course is called ‘Safeguarding Children Awareness’.
Thank you for your anticipated assistance, it is very much appreciated.
Regards,
{!Contact.Compliance_Owner__c}
